name: You VS collapsing Universe
description:
The game is about an Astronaut who has to exterminate aliens to prevent the Universe from collapsing. You will have to concentrate energy or shoot to kill enemies. Enemies drop artifacts that will let you slow the contraction or give you more energy

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • W or Space to jump
  • Mouse Click to shoot enemies
  • Hold E to concentrate energy (Release E to explode)
  • F to see map

Made For LudumDare 50
